values: 启发，使摆脱偏见；教育，使获得教益
To enlighten someone is to teach them about something.
Greek philosophers wanted to enlighten the people of Athens with their ideas.
vt. 启发，启蒙；教导，开导；照耀
to supply with light, to illuminate
